name: Swiss Alps Jigsaw Puzzles (itch)
description:
Swiss Alps Jigsaw Puzzles - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Swiss Alps Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults and children.

FEATURES:

- Perfect for all ages.
- Rotation mode for greater challenge.
- Many bright puzzle images.
- Colorful puzzling atmosphere.
- Traditional puzzle gameplay.
- Simple controls make it easy to solve picture!
